profile:
Window Fashions Depot provides a large selection of interior & exterior window fashions; Shutters, Blinds, Shades, Drapery, Drapery Hardware and Specializes In Window Fashions Motorization. The Window Fashions Depot team is proud to share our passion for window coverings with home owners and businesses alike. 

We offer personalized and customized window covering designs that fit your needs and budget. The showroom is equipped with full sized displays, giving you the opportunity to easily see, touch, and compare products. Our experienced consultants are more than happy to work with you to achieve the look you desire, and offer free in-home consultations, with no obligations.

Adding the finishing touches to your space with style!
We carry a large selection of window coverings for every space.
Located in Toronto - we serve Toronto and the GTA.
Contact us for a quote - we are happy to help and be a part of your project.

profile:
Discover the potential of your home with Lumon's sunrooms, patio covers & balcony glass. Lumon's innovative glass system can retract and slide fully open. Find out more! Pioneer since 1978. Close to the customer. Categories: Balcony, Sunrooms, Patio Covers.

Our sunrooms use high-quality glass from Finland which makes our product more durable, weather-resistant and beautiful. In addition to the quality of the glass we use, our sunrooms also have the unique capability to fully retract their walls, allowing you and your family to enjoy the outdoors regardless of the weather outdoors! Our sunroom glass panels are also frameless, giving you an unobstructed view of your beautiful yard! 
Glass sunrooms for our Canadian customers are produced at our world-class manufacturing facility in Vaughan, Ontario, just north of Toronto. Our Canadian team handles every aspect of your patio enclosure order, from manufacturing to installation. We’ll make sure you’re satisfied every step of the way. 

Given that our patio enclosures and sunrooms were originally developed in Finland, you can trust their performance in harsh weather conditions. Indeed, our patio enclosures have been trusted by customers in Scandinavia for decades. As you know, Canada has its own share of heat, cold, rain and wind. You can be sure that our porch enclosures and sunrooms on Vancouver Island, Vancouver, Toronto, Hamilton or wherever you’re located in Canada can stand up to the weather.

Today, Lumon remains on the cutting edge of research and development. Our patio enclosures continue to pass a wide variety of tests.

profile:
199125+ Years of Experience & Trust
With over 25 years of building and construction experience serving Southwestern Ontario Awning Authority focuses on providing elegant shade solutions that enhance your backyard living and extend the time spent enjoying the outdoors. Our countless satisfied customers speak to our dedication and commitment to quality work.

Retractable Patio Awnings
Increase the comfort of your backyard, patio or deck with an attractive and stylish retractable patio awning. At Awning Authority we help you find solutions for your patio - protect yourself, your patio and outdoor furniture from the heat and the harmful UV rays on those hot summer days. 

Awnings, or overhangs, are a secondary covering attached to the exterior of a building. They are typically made of woven canvas, often with laminated vinyl layers or other protective treatments, and stretched over a strong or rigid structure for support. Awnings, in various formats, have been around centuries, offering protection against sun, rain, and wind, and helping make indoor and outdoor spaces more comfortable for everyone. They can be an attractive and useful addition to your home, protecting it and increasing its value.


BENEFITS OF RETRACTABLE AWNINGS AND SHADE PRODUCTS

ADD BEAUTY AND COMFORT
Awnings can be made from a very wide variety of fabrics with many patterns and colours available to match all styles and tastes. Superior stain resistant fabrics allow for a simple clean. A quality metal housing protects the fabric from weather and birds from nesting.

A NATURAL AIR CONDITIONER
On the hottest summer days, many households run air conditioning around the clock, incurring high electricity bills and generating greenhouse gases. However, blocking sunlight using awnings, particularly at southern and western exposures, can help reduce temperatures on the patio by as much as 12 degrees Celsius, and by 8 degrees indoors

ULTIMATE PROTECTION
Along with increasing the comfort of your backyard patio or deck a retractable shade product can protect you and your furniture from harmful UV rays. It will considerably extend the longevity of your furniture and decor, prevent colours from fading, and fabrics from disintegrating.

CONVENIENCE WITH A WARRANTY
A retractable awning can cover up to 7 meters (23 feet) along the wall and project out as far as 4 meters (13 feet) – enough to cover even the largest patios or terraces. Add a motorized unit for push-button convenience. Plus, we offer full customization! Contact us today with your requirements and we will help you find a solution. We are backed by a 5 year warranty, all of our patio awnings are made in Canada and engineered for durability and quality.
services: Supply and install retractable shade covers with self supporting or free standing options.  Retractable screens for doorways and and openings that require shade.
payment_method: Cash, Cheque and e-transfer.  Financing Available.

In business for 31 years and a Better Business Bureau member for 25 years without a single active complaint on file and an A+ rating. 
Retractableawnings also maintains an A rating on Angieslist. The above ratings are the highest ratings available on both websites.

We ship & install worldwide and have a database of installers worldwide
